text:
Nearby Dining Food Court 24 Hours.
Beside Swimming Pool,
Second Floor,

1.Take wudhu first,(Washroom).Nearby Prayer Room
2.Then go to Prayer room
3. Not to crowded
4. Comfortable

Guide to Prayer Room at Terminal 1
Go to Departure at Level 2 (use lift) will arrive near counter no. 8.
After that, go check in luggage
Then, you may go to immigresen > scan passport.

Turn right, you will find sign board prayer room. Follow that sign board, find escalator near Hall D and go to Level 3.
Turn right again and you will see toilet. Stop for wudhu in the toilet. There is dedicated area for ablution in there.

I used hotel slipper so my shoes will not wet. There is telekung and prayer mat inside.

Next go straight find the prayer room.
Happy pray!

Figure this room from the big signage across from Gucci store. Follow the arrow and take your ablution in the toilet. its a littler away from the prayer room itself. Thank you CHANGI AIRPORT. At first I thought I have to check in on one of the lounges to have a little decent area to pray.

Dont have prayer room at Jewel T1 Changi…
Already ask cleaner staff…
Hope management can solve this matter…
Quite spacey and comfortable, but the wudhu or ablution place is too far. You have to walk back estimately 107 meters. But overall all the facility is quite good
